name: UPI Chem - PHYTOSTEROL 95 MIN
description: UPI Chem offers PHYTOSTEROL 95 MIN, a high-purity plant-derived sterol complex (95% minimum purity) that serves as a natural alternative to cholesterol in barrier repair formulations. Phytosterols provide barrier support, anti-inflammatory benefits, and moisturization while meeting natural and vegan formulation requirements.
notes: 95% minimum purity ensures high quality and efficacy. Phytosterols provide structural similarity to cholesterol while meeting vegan and natural formulation requirements. CAS 83-46-5. Exceptional quality and efficacy for barrier repair applications.
